about_the_game:
What is Dead by Skill Check?

DBSC is essentially exactly what it looks like, aimlabs for Dead by Daylight. I love DbD, I have a huge passion for it, and I wanted something to help me get just a wee bit better at the skill checks. 

And this is that project. 

Warm Ups and Stats

Change the speed and size of skill checks, and work on your performance during Merciless Storm. Go at your own pace or push yourself and see how you stack up on the leaderboards. 

  • Three size settings and merciless storm

  • As fast or slow as you need

  • Good vs Great check tracker

Why free to play?

This project is hardly a game, it's just that - a project. Ideally, a collaborative project that myself and the DbD community can work on together, making it better and helping those newer players coming in and getting some much-needed training on skill checks, or just a warm up before hopping into rounds for the day. 

This project will ALWAYS be free to play.

Why no additional perk simulation? 

The only perk I could see the need to add later on in development is maybe the Doctor's perks, but honestly this has helped me immensely in my skill checks just as a bare bones project. At their core, hook checks, gen checks, they're just different sizes and speeds.

Change the speed and size of skill checks, and work on your performance during Merciless Storm. Go at your own pace or push yourself and see how you stack up on the leaderboards. 

  • Three size settings and merciless storm

Why free to play?

This project is hardly a game, it's just that - a project. Ideally, a collaborative project that myself and the DbD community can work on together, making it better and helping those newer players coming in and getting some much-needed training on skill checks, or just a warm up before hopping into rounds for the day. 

This project will ALWAYS be free to play.

Why no additional perk simulation? 

The only perk I could see the need to add later on in development is maybe the Doctor's perks, but honestly this has helped me immensely in my skill checks just as a bare bones project. At their core, hook checks, gen checks, they're just different sizes and speeds.
name: Dead by Skill Check

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher, ATI Radeon HD-Series 4650 and higher, Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A skill check trainer for Dead by Daylight - to hone your skills or just warm up for the day.
